DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to test the immunogenicity and reactogenicity of the Fluarix™/Influsplit SSW® containing the influenza strains recommended for the 2007-2008 season.
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity and Reactogenicity of Fluarix™ (Influsplit SSW®) 2007/2008 in People 18 Years Old or Above
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female aged 18 years or above; Nonchildbearing or using adequate contraception; Written informed consent obtained from the subject. Subjects must not: Participate in a trial or using nonregistered product; Use immunosuppressants, blood products, or another influenza vaccine during study; Have virologically confirmed influenza within 1 year; Have allergic or acute disease; Have unstabilized serious chronic disease; Be a lactating female.
